message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'm willing to take a bit more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again!
I'm trying to find a balance, let's meet in the middle
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up! I'll give you more, but I need something in return!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a good reason to accept your offers
